thongtin: One week after breaking up, at her wedding, you caught a glimpse of her older sister. And both of you fell in love after that wedding.
What will you be like after 3 years of breaking up? Will you have to get back with your ex because you couldn't pay off all your debts to them?
You will have a new lover at your ex-girlfriend's wedding, and that will be her best friend.
The wife discovered that her husband had proposed to break up with his ex-girlfriend because her family was too poor. He had fallen in love with his wife because of material possessions.
At the age of 35, the husband and wife will reunite and proceed to marriage.
At the age of 40, the wife returned to her husband because at that time he was a wealthy heir.
After the breakup, the husband returned to his ex-girlfriend because she was more beautiful than his wife.
At 50 years old, how will the two of you be? The husband already has a new girlfriend, who is a famous singer.
At 30 years old, who will be in your family? The family consists of 7 people: the husband, the wife, and 5 children.
After the husband and wife broke up, the husband fell in love with his best friend and they got married. After a year, they broke up because the husband realized he still loved his ex-wife.
After breaking up, the husband discovered that he was the third sex. Husband and husband's best friend fell in love
tomLuocText: In love with best friend after breakup

thongtin: One week after breaking up with his wife, the husband started dating his teacher who is 20 years older than him.
After 2 weeks of breaking up, the wife was proposed by the husband's older brother. The wife and the older brother got married and lived together under the same roof.
The beauty of the ex-boyfriend's new girlfriend is so bad, that beauty is not even half half of her.
You suddenly realize your new lover is your ex's best friend and they have known each other for a long time.

You and your new lover go shopping at the supermarket. You, unfortunately, lost your wallet and do not have the money to pay for the goods. Your new lover says they will pay you but when they go to the cashier they run away.

You and your new lover go to eat ice cream at a famous ice cream shop. Little did you know that your new lover is a huge fan of a famous singer and they met their idol at that ice cream parlor. Your new lover has left you behind to pursue that singer.
Introduced to her family by her new boyfriend, the stressed-out sweaty girl washed away her make-up, making her boyfriend not recognize her and mistakenly picking up her roommate.

You and your new lover go to a birthday party. You don't know that your new lover is a very sociable and funny person. At the party, your new lover has made friends with everyone and has kissed front of you with another girl.
She and her new lover go to a thrilling game. During the play, she feels normal and excited, and her lover screams, fearfully hugging her.

You and your new lover go to eat pizza at a famous restaurant. Little did you know that your new crush is a huge fan of a K-pop group and they met their idol at that pizzeria. Your new lover has left you behind to run with that band and ask for autographs.
The 23-year-old girl met her new boyfriend online, and when she met her, she was shocked when that boyfriend was her father.

The girl and her new lover had a date to go to the park. The girl wanted to commemorate the photos with her new lover and asked a passerby for help. Unexpectedly, the person being asked was his ex-girlfriend, he stole the phone and ran away.

The girl and her new boyfriend participated in an intelligence contest on television and had to answer a question related to her ex-lover, everyone around her thought of letting go of this question, but she insisted on answering for her. By all means, she spent a whole day telling all the information about her ex-lover, causing her new boyfriend to lose face and leave her first.
tomLuocText: Girl talks about ex, loses boyfriend.

thongtin: The guy invites his new girlfriend to a restaurant and always orders food that causes the girl to have an allergic reaction, and to be hospitalized.
